ActivateMigrationTargetInstance.title: ActivateMigrationTargetInstance
ActivateMigrationTargetInstance.summary: Switches workloads over from the source PostgreSQL instance to the destination ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance.

AllocateInstancePublicConnection.title: AllocateInstancePublicConnection
AllocateInstancePublicConnection.summary: Apply for a public endpoint for an ApsaraDB RDS instance

AllocateReadWriteSplittingConnection.title: AllocateReadWriteSplittingConnection
AllocateReadWriteSplittingConnection.summary: Applies for a read-only routing endpoint for an instance.

AttachWhitelistTemplateToInstance.title: AttachWhitelistTemplateToInstance
AttachWhitelistTemplateToInstance.summary: Associates a whitelist template with an instance.

CancelImport.title: CancelImport
CancelImport.summary: Cancels the migration task of an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance.

CheckAccountNameAvailable.title: CheckAccountNameAvailable
CheckAccountNameAvailable.summary: Checks whether the username of the account that you want to create on an instance is available.

CheckCloudResourceAuthorized.title: CheckCloudResourceAuthorized
CheckCloudResourceAuthorized.summary: Checks permissions that are granted on an instance.

CheckCreateDdrDBInstance.title: CheckCreateDdrDBInstance
CheckCreateDdrDBInstance.summary: Queries whether an instance can be restored by using a cross-region backup set.

CheckDBNameAvailable.title: CheckDBNameAvailable
CheckDBNameAvailable.summary: Checks whether a database name is unique and conforms to the naming conventions on an instance.

CheckInstanceExist.title: Query whether an instance exists
CheckInstanceExist.summary: You can call the CheckInstanceExist operation to query whether an ApsaraDB RDS instance exists.

CheckServiceLinkedRole.title: CheckServiceLinkedRole
CheckServiceLinkedRole.summary: Checks whether a service-linked role (SLR) is created.

CloneDBInstance.title: CloneDBInstance
CloneDBInstance.summary: Restores the data of an original instance to a new instance. The new instance is called a cloned instance.

CloneParameterGroup.title: CloneParameterGroup
CloneParameterGroup.summary: Replicates a parameter template to the current region or another region.

ConfirmNotify.title: ConfirmNotify
ConfirmNotify.summary: Marks the notifications of an instance within your Alibaba Cloud account as confirmed.

CopyDatabase.title: CopyDatabase
CopyDatabase.summary: Replicates the databases of an instance that runs SQL Server 2008 R2 to another instance. This operation is phased out.

CopyDatabaseBetweenInstances.title: CopyDatabaseBetweenInstances
CopyDatabaseBetweenInstances.summary: Replicates databases between RDS SQL Server instances.

CreateBackup.title: CreateBackup
CreateBackup.summary: Creates a backup file for an instance.

CreateCloudMigrationPrecheckTask.title: CreateCloudMigrationPrecheckTask
CreateCloudMigrationPrecheckTask.summary: Creates an assessment task for cloud migration to an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance.

CreateCloudMigrationTask.title: CreateCloudMigrationTask
CreateCloudMigrationTask.summary: Creates a cloud migration task for an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance.

CreateDBInstanceEndpoint.title: CreateDBInstanceEndpoint
CreateDBInstanceEndpoint.summary: Creates an endpoint for an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance that runs RDS Cluster Edition.

CreateDBInstanceEndpointAddress.title: CreateDBInstanceEndpointAddress
CreateDBInstanceEndpointAddress.summary: Creates a public endpoint for an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance that runs RDS Cluster Edition.

CreateDBInstanceForRebuild.title: CreateDBInstanceForRebuild
CreateDBInstanceForRebuild.summary: Rebuilds an instance from the recycle bin.

CreateDBNodes.title: CreateDBNodes
CreateDBNodes.summary: Adds a read-only node to an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL cluster.

CreateDBProxyEndpointAddress.title: CreateDBProxyEndpointAddress
CreateDBProxyEndpointAddress.summary: Creates the endpoint that is used to connect to the dedicated proxy of an instance.

CreateDatabase.title: CreateDatabase
CreateDatabase.summary: Creates a database in an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

CreateDdrInstance.title: CreateDdrInstance
CreateDdrInstance.summary: Restores data to a new instance across regions.

CreateGADInstance.title: CreateGADInstance
CreateGADInstance.summary: Creates an ApsaraDB RDS global active database cluster.

CreateGadInstanceMember.title: CreateGadInstanceMember
CreateGadInstanceMember.summary: Adds nodes to an ApsaraDB RDS global active database cluster.

CreateMigrateTask.title: CreateMigrateTask
CreateMigrateTask.summary: Creates a migration task to restore backup files from an Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket to an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance.

CreateOnlineDatabaseTask.title: CreateOnlineDatabaseTask
CreateOnlineDatabaseTask.summary: Opens the database that is involved in a backup data migration task of an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance.

CreateOrderForCreateDBNodes.title: CreateOrderForCreateDBNodes
CreateOrderForCreateDBNodes.summary: Adds a node to an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL cluster.

CreateOrderForDeleteDBNodes.title: CreateOrderForDeleteDBNodes
CreateOrderForDeleteDBNodes.summary: Deletes a node from an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance that runs RDS Cluster Edition.

CreateParameterGroup.title: CreateParameterGroup
CreateParameterGroup.summary: Creates a parameter template for an instance.

CreatePostgresExtensions.title: CreatePostgresExtensions
CreatePostgresExtensions.summary: Creates an extension for a database.

CreateSecret.title: CreateSecret
CreateSecret.summary: Creates a credential for a user who uses the Data API feature.

CreateTempDBInstance.title: CreateTempDBInstance
CreateTempDBInstance.summary: Creates a temporary instance for an RDS instance that runs SQL Server 2008 R2 and uses local disks.

DeleteADSetting.title: DeleteADSetting
DeleteADSetting.summary: Deletes an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance from an Active Directory (AD) domain.

DeleteAccount.title: DeleteAccount
DeleteAccount.summary: Deletes an account from an instance.

DeleteBackup.title: DeleteBackup
DeleteBackup.summary: Deletes the data backup files of an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

DeleteBackupFile.title: DeleteBackupFile
DeleteBackupFile.summary: Deletes the backup files of an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance.

DeleteDBInstanceEndpoint.title: DeleteDBInstanceEndpoint
DeleteDBInstanceEndpoint.summary: Deletes the endpoint of an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance that runs RDS Cluster Edition.

DeleteDBInstanceEndpointAddress.title: DeleteDBInstanceEndpointAddress
DeleteDBInstanceEndpointAddress.summary: Releases the public endpoint of an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance that runs RDS Cluster Edition.

DeleteDBNodes.title: DeleteDBNodes
DeleteDBNodes.summary: Deletes a node from an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance that runs RDS Cluster Edition.

DeleteDBProxyEndpointAddress.title: DeleteDBProxyEndpointAddress
DeleteDBProxyEndpointAddress.summary: Deletes the endpoint that is used to connect to the dedicated proxy of an instance.

DeleteDatabase.title: DeleteDatabase
DeleteDatabase.summary: Deletes a database from an RDS instance.

DeleteGadInstance.title: DeleteGadInstance
DeleteGadInstance.summary: Deletes a global active database cluster.

DeleteParameterGroup.title: DeleteParameterGroup
DeleteParameterGroup.summary: Deletes a parameter template from an instance.

DeletePostgresExtensions.title: DeletePostgresExtensions
DeletePostgresExtensions.summary: Deletes an extension from a database.

DeleteSecret.title: DeleteSecret
DeleteSecret.summary: Deletes the credential of a user who uses the Data API feature.

DeleteSlot.title: DeleteSlot
DeleteSlot.summary: Deletes a replication slot of an instance.

DeleteUserBackupFile.title: DeleteUserBackupFile
DeleteUserBackupFile.summary: Deletes the backup files of an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance.

DescibeImportsFromDatabase.title: DescibeImportsFromDatabase
DescibeImportsFromDatabase.summary: Queries the migration tasks of an instance.

DescribeADInfo.title: DescribeADInfo
DescribeADInfo.summary: Queries information about the AD domain of an instance. The information includes whether the instance is added to the AD domain, the name of the AD domain, and the account.

DescribeAccounts.title: DescribeAccounts
DescribeAccounts.summary: Queries the details about the accounts that are created on an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

DescribeActionEventPolicy.title: DescribeActionEventPolicy
DescribeActionEventPolicy.summary: Queries whether the historical events feature is enabled.

DescribeActiveOperationTasks.title: DescribeActiveOperationTasks
DescribeActiveOperationTasks.summary: Queries the details about scheduled O\\\&M tasks for an instance.

DescribeAllWhitelistTemplate.title: DescribeAllWhitelistTemplate
DescribeAllWhitelistTemplate.summary: Queries whitelist templates at a time by using fuzzy search.

DescribeAnalyticdbByPrimaryDBInstance.title: DescribeAnalyticdbByPrimaryDBInstance
DescribeAnalyticdbByPrimaryDBInstance.summary: Queries the number of analytic instances that are associated with an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance.

DescribeAvailableClasses.title: DescribeAvailableClasses
DescribeAvailableClasses.summary: Queries the specifications that are supported for an instance. The specifications include the instance type and the storage capacity.

DescribeAvailableCrossRegion.title: DescribeAvailableCrossRegion
DescribeAvailableCrossRegion.summary: Queries the available destination regions to which the cross-region backup files from a specific source region can be replicated.

DescribeAvailableMetrics.title: DescribeAvailableMetrics
DescribeAvailableMetrics.summary: Queries all Enhanced Monitoring metrics that are supported by an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeAvailableRecoveryTime.title: DescribeAvailableRecoveryTime
DescribeAvailableRecoveryTime.summary: Queries the time range within which data can be restored from a cross-region backup file.

DescribeAvailableZones.title: DescribeAvailableZones
DescribeAvailableZones.summary: Queries the available zones for an instance.

DescribeBackupDatabase.title: DescribeBackupDatabase
DescribeBackupDatabase.summary: Queries the databases that are involved in a backup file.

DescribeBackupPolicy.title: DescribeBackupPolicy
DescribeBackupPolicy.summary: Queries the backup settings of an instance.

DescribeBackupTasks.title: DescribeBackupTasks
DescribeBackupTasks.summary: Queries the backup tasks of an instance.

DescribeBackups.title: DescribeBackups
DescribeBackups.summary: Queries the data backup files of an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

DescribeBinlogFiles.title: DescribeBinlogFiles
DescribeBinlogFiles.summary: Queries the binary log files of an instance that runs MySQL or MariaDB or the write-ahead logging (WAL) files of an instance that runs PostgreSQL.

DescribeCharacterSetName.title: DescribeCharacterSetName
DescribeCharacterSetName.summary: Queries the character sets that are supported by an instance.

DescribeClassDetails.title: DescribeClassDetails
DescribeClassDetails.summary: Queries the details about the instance types of an instance by using the code of the instance types.

DescribeCloudMigrationPrecheckResult.title: DescribeCloudMigrationPrecheckResult
DescribeCloudMigrationPrecheckResult.summary: Query the details about the assessment report for cloud migration to an instance.

DescribeCloudMigrationResult.title: DescribeCloudMigrationResult
DescribeCloudMigrationResult.summary: Queries the details about the cloud migration task of an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeCollationTimeZones.title: DescribeCollationTimeZones
DescribeCollationTimeZones.summary: Queries the character set collations and time zones that are available for use in ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server.

DescribeCrossBackupMetaList.title: DescribeCrossBackupMetaList
DescribeCrossBackupMetaList.summary: Queries the databases and tables whose data is included in a cross-region backup file of an instance.

DescribeCrossRegionBackupDBInstance.title: DescribeCrossRegionBackupDBInstance
DescribeCrossRegionBackupDBInstance.summary: Queries the instances for which the cross-region backup feature is enabled in a region and the cross-region backup settings of these instances.

DescribeCrossRegionBackups.title: DescribeCrossRegionBackups
DescribeCrossRegionBackups.summary: Queries the cross-region data backup files of an instance.

DescribeCrossRegionLogBackupFiles.title: DescribeCrossRegionLogBackupFiles
DescribeCrossRegionLogBackupFiles.summary: Queries the cross-region log backup files of an instance.

DescribeDBInstanceAttribute.title: DescribeDBInstanceAttribute
DescribeDBInstanceAttribute.summary: Queries the details of an instance.

DescribeDBInstanceByTags.title: DescribeDBInstanceByTags
DescribeDBInstanceByTags.summary: Queries information about the tags that are added to an instance.

DescribeDBInstanceDetail.title: Query the details of an instance
DescribeDBInstanceDetail.summary: You can call the DescribeDBInstanceDetail operation to query the details of an instance.

DescribeDBInstanceEncryptionKey.title: DescribeDBInstanceEncryptionKey
DescribeDBInstanceEncryptionKey.summary: You can call the DescribeDBInstanceEncryptionKey operation to check whether disk encryption is enabled for an instance. You can also query details about the keys that are used for disk encryption. This operation is supported for instances that run MySQL, SQL Server, or PostgreSQL.

DescribeDBInstanceEndpoints.title: DescribeDBInstanceEndpoints
DescribeDBInstanceEndpoints.summary: Queries the endpoints of an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance that runs RDS Cluster Edition.

DescribeDBInstanceHAConfig.title: DescribeDBInstanceHAConfig
DescribeDBInstanceHAConfig.summary: Queries the high availability mode and data replication mode of an instance.

DescribeDBInstanceIPArrayList.title: DescribeDBInstanceIPArrayList
DescribeDBInstanceIPArrayList.summary: Queries the IP address whitelist of an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

DescribeDBInstanceIpHostname.title: DescribeDBInstanceIpHostname
DescribeDBInstanceIpHostname.summary: Queries the hostname of the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance on which the ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance runs.

DescribeDBInstanceMetrics.title: DescribeDBInstanceMetrics
DescribeDBInstanceMetrics.summary: Queries the Enhanced Monitoring metrics that are displayed for an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDBInstanceMonitor.title: DescribeDBInstanceMonitor
DescribeDBInstanceMonitor.summary: Queries the monitoring frequency of an instance.

DescribeDBInstanceNetInfo.title: DescribeDBInstanceNetInfo
DescribeDBInstanceNetInfo.summary: Queries all endpoints of an instance.

DescribeDBInstanceNetInfoForChannel.title: DescribeDBInstanceNetInfoForChannel
DescribeDBInstanceNetInfoForChannel.summary: Queries all endpoints of an instance.

DescribeDBInstancePerformance.title: DescribeDBInstancePerformance
DescribeDBInstancePerformance.summary: Queries the performance metrics of an instance.

DescribeDBInstanceProxyConfiguration.title: DescribeDBInstanceProxyConfiguration
DescribeDBInstanceProxyConfiguration.summary: Queries the settings of shared proxies that are enabled on an instance.

DescribeDBInstanceSSL.title: DescribeDBInstanceSSL
DescribeDBInstanceSSL.summary: Queries the SSL configurations of an instance.

DescribeDBInstanceTDE.title: DescribeDBInstanceTDE
DescribeDBInstanceTDE.summary: Queries the status of the Transparent Data Encryption (TDE) feature for an instance.

DescribeDBInstancesByExpireTime.title: DescribeDBInstancesByExpireTime
DescribeDBInstancesByExpireTime.summary: Queries the information about an ApsaraDB RDS instance based on the remaining subscription duration of an instance.

DescribeDBInstancesByPerformance.title: Query instances base on performance
DescribeDBInstancesByPerformance.summary: You can call the DescribeDBInstancePerformance operation to query the performance of instances.

DescribeDBMiniEngineVersions.title: DescribeDBMiniEngineVersions
DescribeDBMiniEngineVersions.summary: Queries minor engine versions that are available for an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance or an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDBProxy.title: DescribeDBProxy
DescribeDBProxy.summary: Queries the settings of the dedicated proxy for an instance.

DescribeDBProxyEndpoint.title: DescribeDBProxyEndpoint
DescribeDBProxyEndpoint.summary: Queries the endpoints that are used to connect to the dedicated proxy of an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

DescribeDBProxyPerformance.title: DescribeDBProxyPerformance
DescribeDBProxyPerformance.summary: Queries the performance data of the dedicated proxy of an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

DescribeDTCSecurityIpHostsForSQLServer.title: DescribeDTCSecurityIpHostsForSQLServer
DescribeDTCSecurityIpHostsForSQLServer.summary: Queries the distributed transaction whitelists of an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance.

DescribeDatabases.title: DescribeDatabases
DescribeDatabases.summary: Queries the details about the databases on an instance.

DescribeDedicatedHostGroups.title: DescribeDedicatedHostGroups
DescribeDedicatedHostGroups.summary: Queries information about an ApsaraDB MyBase dedicated cluster.

DescribeDedicatedHosts.title: DescribeDedicatedHosts
DescribeDedicatedHosts.summary: Queries the information about the hosts in a dedicated cluster.

DescribeDetachedBackups.title: DescribeDetachedBackups
DescribeDetachedBackups.summary: Queries the data backup files of an ApsaraDB RDS instance that is released.

DescribeDiagnosticReportList.title: DescribeDiagnosticReportList
DescribeDiagnosticReportList.summary: Queries the information about diagnostics reports.

DescribeErrorLogs.title: DescribeErrorLogs
DescribeErrorLogs.summary: Queries the error logs of an instance over a specific time range.

DescribeEvents.title: DescribeEvents
DescribeEvents.summary: Queries historical events of an instance.

DescribeGadInstances.title: DescribeGadInstances
DescribeGadInstances.summary: Queries the information about a global active database cluster or information about all global active database clusters in a region.

DescribeHADiagnoseConfig.title: DescribeHADiagnoseConfig
DescribeHADiagnoseConfig.summary: Queries the availability check method of an instance.

DescribeHASwitchConfig.title: DescribeHASwitchConfig
DescribeHASwitchConfig.summary: Queries the settings of the automatic primary/secondary switchover feature for an instance.

DescribeHistoryTasks.title: DescribeHistoryTasks
DescribeHistoryTasks.summary: Queries the historical tasks that are created within 30 days.

DescribeHostWebShell.title: DescribeHostWebShell
DescribeHostWebShell.summary: Queries the webshell URL that is used to connect to the host of an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance.

DescribeInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute.title: DescribeInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute
DescribeInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute.summary: Queries the automatic renewal status of an instance.

DescribeInstanceCrossBackupPolicy.title: DescribeInstanceCrossBackupPolicy
DescribeInstanceCrossBackupPolicy.summary: Queries the cross-region backup settings of an instance.

DescribeInstanceKeywords.title: Query reserved keywords
DescribeInstanceKeywords.summary: You can call the DescribeInstanceKeywords operation to query the reserved keywords of an ApsaraDB RDS instance. The reserved keywords cannot be used for the usernames of accounts or the names of databases.

DescribeInstanceLinkedWhitelistTemplate.title: DescribeInstanceLinkedWhitelistTemplate
DescribeInstanceLinkedWhitelistTemplate.summary: Queries associated whitelists by instance name.

DescribeLocalAvailableRecoveryTime.title: DescribeLocalAvailableRecoveryTime
DescribeLocalAvailableRecoveryTime.summary: Queries the time range to which an RDS instance can be restored.

DescribeLogBackupFiles.title: DescribeLogBackupFiles
DescribeLogBackupFiles.summary: Queries the log backup files of an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance.

DescribeMetaList.title: DescribeMetaList
DescribeMetaList.summary: Queries the information about the databases and tables that can be restored from a specified backup set.

DescribeMigrateTaskById.title: DescribeMigrateTaskById
DescribeMigrateTaskById.summary: Queries a task that is used to import the backup data of an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance to an Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket.

DescribeMigrateTasks.title: DescribeMigrateTasks
DescribeMigrateTasks.summary: Queries the tasks that are created to migrate the backup data of an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance.

DescribeModifyPGHbaConfigLog.title: DescribeModifyPGHbaConfigLog
DescribeModifyPGHbaConfigLog.summary: Queries the details about the modifications to the pg_hba.conf file of an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeModifyParameterLog.title: DescribeModifyParameterLog
DescribeModifyParameterLog.summary: Queries the parameter modification logs of an instance.

DescribeOssDownloads.title: DescribeOssDownloads
DescribeOssDownloads.summary: Queries the backup files that are included in a backup data migration task of an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance.

DescribePGHbaConfig.title: DescribePGHbaConfig
DescribePGHbaConfig.summary: Queries the configuration of the pg_hba.conf file of an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeParameterGroup.title: DescribeParameterGroup
DescribeParameterGroup.summary: Queries the information about a parameter template.

DescribeParameterGroups.title: DescribeParameterGroups
DescribeParameterGroups.summary: Queries the parameter templates that are available in a region.

DescribeParameters.title: DescribeParameters
DescribeParameters.summary: Queries the parameter settings of an instance.

DescribePostgresExtensions.title: DescribePostgresExtensions
DescribePostgresExtensions.summary: Queries extensions that are installed on a database.

DescribePrice.title: DescribePrice
DescribePrice.summary: Queries the price of an instance.

DescribeReadDBInstanceDelay.title: DescribeReadDBInstanceDelay
DescribeReadDBInstanceDelay.summary: Queries the latency of data replication between a primary instance and its read-only instance.

DescribeRegions.title: Query regions
DescribeRegions.summary: You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the details about the regions that are available to ApsaraDB RDS.

DescribeRenewalPrice.title: DescribeRenewalPrice
DescribeRenewalPrice.summary: Queries the renewal fees for a subscription instance.

DescribeResourceUsage.title: DescribeResourceUsage
DescribeResourceUsage.summary: Queries the storage usage of an instance.

DescribeSQLCollectorPolicy.title: DescribeSQLCollectorPolicy
DescribeSQLCollectorPolicy.summary: Queries the status of the SQL Explorer (SQL Audit) feature for an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

DescribeSQLCollectorRetention.title: DescribeSQLCollectorRetention
DescribeSQLCollectorRetention.summary: Queries the retention period of the log files that are generated by the SQL Explorer feature for an instance.

DescribeSQLLogFiles.title: DescribeSQLLogFiles
DescribeSQLLogFiles.summary: Queries the log files that are generated by the SQL Explorer (SQL Audit) feature for an instance. The DescribeSQLLogFiles operation does not return the log files that are generated by the SQL Explorer feature and manually exported from the ApsaraDB RDS console. The DescribeSQLLogFiles operation returns the SQL Explorer log files that are generated by calling the DescribeSQLLogRecords operation with the request parameter Form set to File.

DescribeSQLLogRecords.title: DescribeSQLLogRecords
DescribeSQLLogRecords.summary: Queries the logs that are generated by the SQL Explorer (SQL Audit) feature for an instance.

DescribeSecrets.title: DescribeSecrets
DescribeSecrets.summary: Queries the credential of a user who uses the Data API feature.

DescribeSecurityGroupConfiguration.title: DescribeSecurityGroupConfiguration
DescribeSecurityGroupConfiguration.summary: Queries ECS security groups to which an instance is added.

DescribeSlots.title: DescribeSlots
DescribeSlots.summary: Queries all replication slots of an instance.

DescribeSlowLogRecords.title: DescribeSlowLogRecords
DescribeSlowLogRecords.summary: Queries the slow log details of an instance.

DescribeSlowLogs.title: DescribeSlowLogs
DescribeSlowLogs.summary: Queries the statistics on slow query logs.

DescribeSupportOnlineResizeDisk.title: DescribeSupportOnlineResizeDisk
DescribeSupportOnlineResizeDisk.summary: Checks whether the disk of an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance can be resized online.

DescribeTasks.title: Query the tasks
DescribeTasks.summary: You can call the DescribeTasks operation to query the tasks that are running on an instance.

DescribeUpgradeMajorVersionPrecheckTask.title: DescribeUpgradeMajorVersionPrecheckTask
DescribeUpgradeMajorVersionPrecheckTask.summary: Queries the check report of a major engine version upgrade for an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeUpgradeMajorVersionTasks.title: DescribeUpgradeMajorVersionTasks
DescribeUpgradeMajorVersionTasks.summary: Queries the historical tasks for major engine version upgrades of an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeVSwitches.title: DescribeVSwitches
DescribeVSwitches.summary: Queries the details of vSwitches that are available in a virtual private cloud (VPC).

DescribeWhitelistTemplate.title: DescribeWhitelistTemplate
DescribeWhitelistTemplate.summary: Queries information about the specified IP whitelist.

DescribeWhitelistTemplateLinkedInstance.title: DescribeWhitelistTemplateLinkedInstance
DescribeWhitelistTemplateLinkedInstance.summary: Queries associated instances by whitelist template.

DestroyDBInstance.title: Destroy an instance
DestroyDBInstance.summary: You can call the DestroyDBInstance operation to destroy an instance. The instance is in the Locked state.

DetachGadInstanceMember.title: DetachGadInstanceMember
DetachGadInstanceMember.summary: Removes a unit node from a global active database cluster.

DetachWhitelistTemplateToInstance.title: DetachWhitelistTemplateToInstance
DetachWhitelistTemplateToInstance.summary: Disassociates a whitelist template from an instance.

GetDBInstanceTopology.title: GetDBInstanceTopology
GetDBInstanceTopology.summary: Queries the topology of an instance.

GetDbProxyInstanceSsl.title: GetDbProxyInstanceSsl
GetDbProxyInstanceSsl.summary: Queries the SSL encryption settings for a dedicated proxy endpoint of an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance.

GrantAccountPrivilege.title: GrantAccountPrivilege
GrantAccountPrivilege.summary: Grants an account the permissions on a database of an instance.

GrantOperatorPermission.title: GrantOperatorPermission
GrantOperatorPermission.summary: Grant permissions to a service account.

ImportDatabaseBetweenInstances.title: ImportDatabaseBetweenInstances
ImportDatabaseBetweenInstances.summary: Migrates data across ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instances.

ImportUserBackupFile.title: ImportUserBackupFile
ImportUserBackupFile.summary: Imports the backup data of a self-managed instance that runs MySQL 5.7 to an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance.

ListClasses.title: ListClasses
ListClasses.summary: Queries the specification details of an instance.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to one or more instances.

ListUserBackupFiles.title: ListUserBackupFiles
ListUserBackupFiles.summary: Queries the details about the full backup files that are imported into an instance.

LockAccount.title: LockAccount
LockAccount.summary: Locks an account of an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance.

MigrateConnectionToOtherZone.title: MigrateConnectionToOtherZone
MigrateConnectionToOtherZone.summary: Migrates an instance to a different zone.

MigrateDBInstance.title: MigrateDBInstance
MigrateDBInstance.summary: Migrates an instance across hosts in a dedicated cluster.

MigrateSecurityIPMode.title: MigrateSecurityIPMode
MigrateSecurityIPMode.summary: Changes the whitelist mode of an instance from the standard whitelist mode to the enhanced whitelist mode.

MigrateToOtherZone.title: MigrateToOtherZone
MigrateToOtherZone.summary: Migrates an instance across zones in the same region.

ModifyADInfo.title: ModifyADInfo
ModifyADInfo.summary: Modifies the AD domain information about an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance.

ModifyAccountDescription.title: ModifyAccountDescription
ModifyAccountDescription.summary: Modifies the description of a database account.

ModifyActionEventPolicy.title: ModifyActionEventPolicy
ModifyActionEventPolicy.summary: Enables or disables the event history feature of an instance.

ModifyActiveOperationTasks.title: ModifyActiveOperationTasks
ModifyActiveOperationTasks.summary: Changes the switching time of scheduled O\\\\\\&M tasks for an instance.

ModifyBackupPolicy.title: ModifyBackupPolicy
ModifyBackupPolicy.summary: Modifies the backup policy settings of an instance.

ModifyCollationTimeZone.title: ModifyCollationTimeZone
ModifyCollationTimeZone.summary: Modifies the character set collation and time zone of system databases on an instance.

ModifyDBDescription.title: ModifyDBDescription
ModifyDBDescription.summary: Modifies the description of an instance.

ModifyDBInstanceAutoUpgradeMinorVersion.title: ModifyDBInstanceAutoUpgradeMinorVersion
ModifyDBInstanceAutoUpgradeMinorVersion.summary: Changes the method that is used to update the minor engine version of an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance or an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance.

ModifyDBInstanceConfig.title: ModifyDBInstanceConfig
ModifyDBInstanceConfig.summary: Modifies the configuration item of an instance.

ModifyDBInstanceConnectionMode.title: ModifyDBInstanceConnectionMode
ModifyDBInstanceConnectionMode.summary: Enables or disables the database proxy feature. This operation is no longer available.

ModifyDBInstanceConnectionString.title: ModifyDBInstanceConnectionString
ModifyDBInstanceConnectionString.summary: Modifies the endpoint and port of an instance.

ModifyDBInstanceDelayedReplicationTime.title: ModifyDBInstanceDelayedReplicationTime
ModifyDBInstanceDelayedReplicationTime.summary: Configures the replication latency for a read-only ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance.

ModifyDBInstanceDeletionProtection.title: ModifyDBInstanceDeletionProtection
ModifyDBInstanceDeletionProtection.summary: Enable or disable the release protection feature for an instance.

ModifyDBInstanceDescription.title: Modify the name of an instance
ModifyDBInstanceDescription.summary: You can call the ModifyDBInstanceDescription operation to modify the name of an instance.

ModifyDBInstanceEndpoint.title: ModifyDBInstanceEndpoint
ModifyDBInstanceEndpoint.summary: Modifies the weights of the nodes configured for the endpoint of an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance that runs RDS Cluster Edition.

ModifyDBInstanceEndpointAddress.title: ModifyDBInstanceEndpointAddress
ModifyDBInstanceEndpointAddress.summary: Modifies the information about the endpoint of an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance that runs RDS Cluster Edition.

ModifyDBInstanceHAConfig.title: ModifyDBInstanceHAConfig
ModifyDBInstanceHAConfig.summary: Changes the high availability (HA) and data replication mode of an instance.

ModifyDBInstanceMaintainTime.title: ModifyDBInstanceMaintainTime
ModifyDBInstanceMaintainTime.summary: Modifies the maintenance window of an instance.

ModifyDBInstanceMetrics.title: ModifyDBInstanceMetrics
ModifyDBInstanceMetrics.summary: Modifies the Enhanced Monitoring metrics that are displayed for an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance.

ModifyDBInstanceNetworkExpireTime.title: ModifyDBInstanceNetworkExpireTime
ModifyDBInstanceNetworkExpireTime.summary: Changes the expiration time of the classic network endpoint of an instance in hybrid access mode.

ModifyDBInstanceNetworkType.title: ModifyDBInstanceNetworkType
ModifyDBInstanceNetworkType.summary: Changes the network type of an ApsaraDB RDS instance from classic network to VPC

ModifyDBInstancePayType.title: ModifyDBInstancePayType
ModifyDBInstancePayType.summary: Changes the billing method of an instance from pay-as-you-go to subscription.

ModifyDBInstanceProxyConfiguration.title: ModifyDBInstanceProxyConfiguration
ModifyDBInstanceProxyConfiguration.summary: You can call the ModifyDBInstanceProxyConfiguration operation to configure the database proxy for an instance.

ModifyDBInstanceSSL.title: ModifyDBInstanceSSL
ModifyDBInstanceSSL.summary: Modifies the SSL encryption settings of an instance.

ModifyDBInstanceSpec.title: ModifyDBInstanceSpec
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.summary: Changes the instance type and storage capacity of an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

ModifyDBInstanceTDE.title: ModifyDBInstanceTDE
ModifyDBInstanceTDE.summary: Enables the Transparent Data Encryption (TDE) feature for an ApsaraDB RDS instance and modifies the TDE status for the instance.

ModifyDBNode.title: ModifyDBNode
ModifyDBNode.summary: Changes the specifications and storage capacity of an instance.

ModifyDBProxy.title: ModifyDBProxy
ModifyDBProxy.summary: Enables or disables the dedicated proxy feature for an instance.

ModifyDBProxyEndpoint.title: ModifyDBProxyEndpoint
ModifyDBProxyEndpoint.summary: Modifies the proxy terminal configurations of a dedicated proxy for an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

ModifyDBProxyEndpointAddress.title: ModifyDBProxyEndpointAddress
ModifyDBProxyEndpointAddress.summary: Changes an endpoint that is used to connect to the dedicated proxy of an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

ModifyDBProxyInstance.title: Modify the database proxy settings
ModifyDBProxyInstance.summary: You can call the ModifyDBProxyInstance operation to modify the database proxy settings of an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

ModifyDTCSecurityIpHostsForSQLServer.title: ModifyDTCSecurityIpHostsForSQLServer
ModifyDTCSecurityIpHostsForSQLServer.summary: Configures a distributed transaction whitelist for an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance.

ModifyDasInstanceConfig.title: ModifyDasInstanceConfig
ModifyDasInstanceConfig.summary: Configures automatic storage expansion for an instance.

ModifyDatabaseConfig.title: ModifyDatabaseConfig
ModifyDatabaseConfig.summary: Modifies the property settings of an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance.

ModifyDbProxyInstanceSsl.title: ModifyDbProxyInstanceSsl
ModifyDbProxyInstanceSsl.summary: Configures SSL encryption for an dedicated proxy endpoint of an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance.

ModifyHADiagnoseConfig.title: ModifyHADiagnoseConfig
ModifyHADiagnoseConfig.summary: Change the availability check method of an instance.

ModifyHASwitchConfig.title: ModifyHASwitchConfig
ModifyHASwitchConfig.summary: Enables or disables the automatic primary/secondary switchover feature for an instance.

ModifyInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute.title: ModifyInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute
ModifyInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute.summary: Modifies the auto-renewal settings of an instance.

ModifyInstanceCrossBackupPolicy.title: ModifyInstanceCrossBackupPolicy
ModifyInstanceCrossBackupPolicy.summary: Modifies the cross-region backup settings of an instance.

ModifyPGHbaConfig.title: ModifyPGHbaConfig
ModifyPGHbaConfig.summary: Modifies the pg_hba.conf file of an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance.

ModifyParameter.title: ModifyParameter
ModifyParameter.summary: Modifies the parameter values of an instance.

ModifyParameterGroup.title: ModifyParameterGroup
ModifyParameterGroup.summary: Modifies the parameter template of an instance.

ModifyReadWriteSplittingConnection.title: ModifyReadWriteSplittingConnection
ModifyReadWriteSplittingConnection.summary: Modifies the latency threshold of the read/write splitting link and the read weights of a primary instance and its read-only instances.

ModifyReadonlyInstanceDelayReplicationTi.title: ModifyReadonlyInstanceDelayReplicationTime
ModifyReadonlyInstanceDelayReplicationTi.summary: Modifies the latency at which a read-only ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance replicates data from its primary instance.

ModifyResourceGroup.title: ModifyResourceGroup
ModifyResourceGroup.summary: Moves an ApsaraDB RDS instance to a specified resource group.

ModifySQLCollectorPolicy.title: ModifySQLCollectorPolicy
ModifySQLCollectorPolicy.summary: Enables or disables the SQL Explorer (SQL Audit) feature for an instance.

ModifySQLCollectorRetention.title: ModifySQLCollectorRetention
ModifySQLCollectorRetention.summary: Changes the retention period of the log files that are generated by the SQL Explorer feature for an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

ModifySecurityGroupConfiguration.title: ModifySecurityGroupConfiguration
ModifySecurityGroupConfiguration.summary: Changes the ECS security groups to which an instance is added.

ModifySecurityIps.title: ModifySecurityIps
ModifySecurityIps.summary: Modifies the IP address whitelist of an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

ModifyWhitelistTemplate.title: ModifyWhitelistTemplate
ModifyWhitelistTemplate.summary: Edits a whitelist. You can call this operation to create, modify, or delete a whitelist.

PurgeDBInstanceLog.title: PurgeDBInstanceLog
PurgeDBInstanceLog.summary: Clears the on-premises logs of an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

QueryNotify.title: QueryNotify
QueryNotify.summary: Queries the notifications of an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

RebuildDBInstance.title: RebuildDBInstance
RebuildDBInstance.summary: Rebuilds the secondary instance of a primary instance in a dedicated cluster.

ReceiveDBInstance.title: ReceiveDBInstance
ReceiveDBInstance.summary: Switches a primary instance to a disaster recovery instance or a disaster recovery instance to a primary instance.

RecoveryDBInstance.title: RecoveryDBInstance
RecoveryDBInstance.summary: Restores an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance.

ReleaseInstanceConnection.title: ReleaseInstanceConnection
ReleaseInstanceConnection.summary: Releases the public endpoint of an instance.

ReleaseInstancePublicConnection.title: ReleaseInstancePublicConnection
ReleaseInstancePublicConnection.summary: Releases the public endpoint of an instance.

ReleaseReadWriteSplittingConnection.title: ReleaseReadWriteSplittingConnection
ReleaseReadWriteSplittingConnection.summary: Releases the read/write splitting endpoint of an instance.

ResetAccount.title: ResetAccount
ResetAccount.summary: Resets the permissions of the privileged account.

ResetAccountPassword.title: ResetAccountPassword
ResetAccountPassword.summary: Resets the password of a database account.

RestoreDdrTable.title: RestoreDdrTable
RestoreDdrTable.summary: Restores data to an existing instance across regions.

RestoreTable.title: RestoreTable
RestoreTable.summary: Restores individual databases or tables of an instance to the original instance.

RevokeAccountPrivilege.title: RevokeAccountPrivilege
RevokeAccountPrivilege.summary: Removes the permissions on a database of an ApsaraDB RDS instance from an account.

RevokeOperatorPermission.title: RevokeOperatorPermission
RevokeOperatorPermission.summary: Revokes permissions from the service account of an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

SwitchDBInstanceHA.title: SwitchDBInstanceHA
SwitchDBInstanceHA.summary: Switches workloads between primary and secondary ApsaraDB RDS instances.

SwitchDBInstanceNetType.title: SwitchDBInstanceNetType
SwitchDBInstanceNetType.summary: Switches between internal and public endpoints of an instance in the classic network.

SwitchDBInstanceVpc.title: SwitchDBInstanceVpc
SwitchDBInstanceVpc.summary: Changes the virtual private cloud (VPC) and vSwitch for an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

SwitchGuardToMasterInstance.title: SwitchGuardToMasterInstance
SwitchGuardToMasterInstance.summary: Switches a disaster recovery instance to a primary instance.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates and adds tags to one or more instances.

TerminateMigrateTask.title: TerminateMigrateTask
TerminateMigrateTask.summary: Terminates an ongoing migration task of an ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance.

TransformDBInstancePayType.title: TransformDBInstancePayType
TransformDBInstancePayType.summary: Changes the billing method of an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

UnlockAccount.title: UnlockAccount
UnlockAccount.summary: Unlocks a database account of an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes tags from one or more instances.

UpdatePostgresExtensions.title: UpdatePostgresExtensions
UpdatePostgresExtensions.summary: Updates the version of an extension on a database.

UpdateUserBackupFile.title: UpdateUserBackupFile
UpdateUserBackupFile.summary: Modifies the description and retention period of a full backup file.

UpgradeDBInstanceEngineVersion.title: UpgradeDBInstanceEngineVersion
UpgradeDBInstanceEngineVersion.summary: Upgrades the major engine version of an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance.

UpgradeDBInstanceKernelVersion.title: UpgradeDBInstanceKernelVersion
UpgradeDBInstanceKernelVersion.summary: Updates the minor engine version of an ApsaraDB RDS instance.

UpgradeDBInstanceMajorVersion.title: UpgradeDBInstanceMajorVersion
UpgradeDBInstanceMajorVersion.summary: Initiates a task to upgrade the major engine version of an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance.

UpgradeDBInstanceMajorVersionPrecheck.title: UpgradeDBInstanceMajorVersionPrecheck
UpgradeDBInstanceMajorVersionPrecheck.summary: Performs a precheck before the upgrade of the major engine version of an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance.

UpgradeDBProxyInstanceKernelVersion.title: UpgradeDBProxyInstanceKernelVersion
UpgradeDBProxyInstanceKernelVersion.summary: Upgrades the dedicated proxy version of an instance.
